channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- FortiPortal
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- FortiPortal

item.title: CVE-2022-41336|2024-10-23T14:51:08.943Z -- fortinet -- fortiportal
item.description: An improper neutralization of input during web page generation vulnerability [CWE-79] in FortiPortal versions 6.0.0 through 6.0.11 and all versions of 5.3, 5.2, 5.1, 5.0 management interface may allow a remote authenticated attacker to perform a stored cross site scripting (XSS) attack via sending request with specially crafted columnindex parameter.

item.title: CVE-2024-23105|2024-08-01T22:51:11.244Z -- fortinet -- fortiportal
item.description: A Use Of Less Trusted Source [CWE-348] vulnerability in Fortinet FortiPortal version 7.0.0 through 7.0.6 and version 7.2.0 through 7.2.1 allows an unauthenticated attack to bypass IP protection through crafted HTTP or HTTPS packets.

item.title: CVE-2024-21759|2024-08-01T22:27:36.325Z -- fortinet -- fortiportal
item.description: An authorization bypass through user-controlled key in Fortinet FortiPortal version 7.2.0, and versions 7.0.0 through 7.0.6 allows attacker to view unauthorized resources via HTTP or HTTPS requests.

item.title: CVE-2024-21759|2024-07-09T15:33:31.028Z -- fortinet -- fortiportal
item.description: An authorization bypass through user-controlled key in Fortinet FortiPortal version 7.2.0, and versions 7.0.0 through 7.0.6 allows attacker to view unauthorized resources via HTTP or HTTPS requests.

item.title: CVE-2023-48789|2024-06-03T07:57:22.756Z -- fortinet -- fortiportal
item.description: A client-side enforcement of server-side security in Fortinet FortiPortal version 6.0.0 through 6.0.14 allows attacker to improper access control via crafted HTTP requests.

item.title: CVE-2024-23105|2024-06-04T17:45:42.509Z -- fortinet -- fortiportal
item.description: A Use Of Less Trusted Source [CWE-348] vulnerability in Fortinet FortiPortal version 7.0.0 through 7.0.6 and version 7.2.0 through 7.2.1 allows an unauthenticated attack to bypass IP protection through crafted HTTP or HTTPS packets.

item.title: CVE-2024-31495|2024-06-11T16:43:59.236Z -- fortinet -- fortiportal
item.description: A improper neutralization of special elements used in an sql command ('sql injection') in Fortinet FortiPortal versions 7.0.0 through 7.0.6 and version 7.2.0 allows privileged user to obtain unauthorized information via the report download functionality.

item.title: CVE-2023-48789|2024-07-05T17:22:50.576Z -- fortinet -- fortiportal
item.description: A client-side enforcement of server-side security in Fortinet FortiPortal version 6.0.0 through 6.0.14 allows attacker to improper access control via crafted HTTP requests.

item.title: CVE-2024-21759|2024-07-09T17:04:39.072Z -- fortinet -- fortiportal
item.description: An authorization bypass through user-controlled key in Fortinet FortiPortal version 7.2.0, and versions 7.0.0 through 7.0.6 allows attacker to view unauthorized resources via HTTP or HTTPS requests.

item.title: CVE-2024-31495|2024-08-02T01:52:57.311Z -- fortinet -- fortiportal
item.description: A improper neutralization of special elements used in an sql command ('sql injection') in Fortinet FortiPortal versions 7.0.0 through 7.0.6 and version 7.2.0 allows privileged user to obtain unauthorized information via the report download functionality.

item.title: CVE-2023-48789|2024-08-02T21:37:55.014Z -- fortinet -- fortiportal
item.description: A client-side enforcement of server-side security in Fortinet FortiPortal version 6.0.0 through 6.0.14 allows attacker to improper access control via crafted HTTP requests.
